name: Bar_Wars_Hero
description:
Welcome to Bar_Wars_Heroe !

MADE WITH PICO8!

Work in progress action platformer by students of SoG Cologne.

School of Games (Cologne) – Game Jam | 18.12.2017 – 21.12.2017

• Random groups out of 2

• Normally 1 Programmer and 1 Artist
